strapiEvent.name: Benton County Sheriff's Cup Cocktail Event and Golf Tournament
strapiEvent.description:
The Benton County Sheriff's Cup Cocktail Event will take place Sunday, Jun 11, from 6-9p, including hors d'oeuvres from Carmelita's Modern Mexican Cuisine, auctions and raffles, live music from Bullet Proof Band, and fun with Ozark Axe Throwing.


The event is organized by L.E.A.P. NWA, which provides protective equipment for local law enforcement and offers financial & medical assistance for officers and their families during times of need.


Purchase sponsorship packages HERE and register for the Golf Tournament HERE.
